channel.title: GPS on Rafael Tieppo
channel.description: Recent content in GPS on Rafael Tieppo

item.title: Amazing and simple apps for navigating tracks and other stuff.
item.description: Motivation Some times I plan a tracking activity and create a route in QGIS, after I just export as geojson or kml file to use in the mobile. The QField is outstanding, but I would like something more simple, besides it should allow to work off-line. After some research I found two options for my issues: OsmAnd (Offline Maps & GPS): Best for power users, hikers, and detailed mapping, offering offline topo lines, contours, and 3D terrain.
